description: System-generated primary key for this cost transaction type; unique, non-business identifier used for internal joins.
Business identifier for the cost transaction type, used by application logic and configurations to reference the type.
Human-readable label describing the inventory/parts cost transaction type used in stock and cost movements.
Optional free-text notes providing additional context about the transaction type.
System timestamp of the most recent update to this record for auditing/version control.
Likely date/time of the last user-attributed modification; field name implies a user, but stored values are timestampsâ€”confirm with SME.
Identifier of the user who originally created this transaction type record.
Date and time when this record was first created.
Identifier of the user who last modified this record.
Date and time when this record was last modified by a user.
